text: Robert LeRoy Diamond (August 23, 1943 - May 15, 2019) was an American actor. He starred in the 1950s television series Fury as Joey Clark Newton. He was born in Los Angeles, California. Diamond died on May 15, 2019 of cancer in Thousand Oaks, California at the age of 75. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American television actors Category:American child actors Category:1943 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Bobby Diamond
